verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns<s%>; let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>; let the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H339>islands<s%> be glad <S%H8055>there<s%>.
<S%H6051>Clouds<s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6664>him<s%>: righteousness and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> are the <S%H4349>habitation<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne<s%>.
A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3212>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3857>him<s%>, and burns up his <S%H6862>enemies<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

The <S%H2022>hills<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%> like <S%H1749>wax<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.
<S%H954>Confounded<s%> be all they that <S%H5647>serve<s%> engraved <S%H6459>images<s%>, that <S%H1984>boast<s%> themselves of <S%H457>idols<s%>: <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H430>him<s%>, all you gods.

<S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%>, and was <S%H8055>glad<s%>; and the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%> because of your <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
For <S%H3068>you<s%>, Lord, are high <S%H5945>above<s%> all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: you are <S%H5927>exalted<s%> far <S%H3966>above<s%> all <S%H430>gods<s%>.

You that <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: he <S%H8104>preserves<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints<s%>; he <S%H5337>delivers<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
<S%H216>Light<s%> is <S%H2232>sown<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; and give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> at the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>.
